header: How should I store my products?
subheader:
•Both our corn and flour tortillas can be stored unrefrigerated away from high heat and humidity.
•All of our corn masas, breads, and premade goods should always be refrigerated to maintain freshness
•Our chiles rellenos and tamales should be frozen for long term storage but can be refrigerated for thawing and immediate use
•Spices and chiles can be stored in a dry environment, away from humidity, with no refrigeration required
